com.solidfire.serialization

Class DateTimeAdapter

  • Object
    • TypeAdapter<DateTime>
      • DateTimeAdapter

  • public class DateTimeAdapter
extends TypeAdapter<DateTime>
    Handles converting a DateTime object to and from JSON.
